jd: From: Abhishek Yadav, DMS Visions INC abhishek@dmsvisions.com Reply to: abhishek@dmsvisions.com Hi,Hope you are doing well !!I have an urgent position. Job Title: Workday Business/Data AnalystLocation: 100% Remote role (Augusta, ME)Duration: 6-12 Months Contract ****While sharing resume mention consultant location and visa status*** Job Description: Top 3 Skills:1. 1+ years of experience with Workday HCM and/or Payroll.2. Exceptional written and verbal communication skills.3. Ability to synthesize multiple sources of data/information and compile into a cohesive presentation.We are hiring a Business Analyst to join our project team. The Project Management Office is looking for individuals to join the PMO as a resource to be assigned as needed. Assignment can be with any department within the state of Maine, dependent on need. You will report directly to the project management office. Your main tasks will include performing detailed requirements analysis, documenting processes, and performing some user acceptance testing. As a key contributor to the Workday implementation it is imperative that you establish high quality standards and lead by example.Key Responsibilities:Monitoring/Supporting/Researching Data Quality/Data Cleanup with StakeholdersData ValidationTicket Management (JIRA)Eliciting, analyzing, documenting, validating, and communicating business requirementsGeneral project documentation (i.e. meeting notes, drafting proposals)General support through testing phases: researching issues, providing guidance on defect resolutionOther Project Support tasks as identifiedRequired Skills:Exceptional written and verbal communication skillsStrong analytical skillsProficient with Excel (VLOOKUP's, pivot tables, concatenations, etc.)Excellent active listening skillsAbility to clearly articulate messages to various audiencesActive listening skillsAbility to influence othersFlexibility and adaptability; ability to work in ambiguous situations at all levels of the organizationProblem solving and root cause analysis skillAbility to synthesize multiple sources of data/information and compile into a cohesive presentationRequired EducationBachelor's degree If you are interested, please share your updated resume and suggest the best number & time to connect with you.
